DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate Effect Omeprazole Pharmacokinetics Ibrutinib Healthy Adults .
DOC.brief_title: A Drug Interaction Study Assess Effect Omeprazole Pharmacokinetics Ibrutinib Healthy Adults
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label ( people know identity intervention ) , single-center , sequential-design drug interaction study assess effect omeprazole pharmacokinetics ibrutinib metabolite PCI-45227 healthy participant . The study mainly consist 3 Phases : Screening Phase ( within 21 day prior first dose study medication ) , treatment Phase , follow Phase ( 10 12 day last dose study medication ) . In treatment Phase , participant receive Ibrutinib 560 milligram ( mg ) orally ( 4 x 140 mg capsule ) Day 1 Day 7. participant receive Omeprazole dose 40 mg tablet orally Days 3 7 . The total duration study participant approximately 29 32 day . Blood sample collect evaluation pharmacokinetics Ibrutinib . Participants ' safety monitor throughout study .
